input.sentences: backyard parties are very popular during summer time .
[female] arranged a backyard party for her high school friends last weekend .
her cousin [male] was also invited along with other guests .
there were around 20 guests at [female] 's house that evening .
everyone enjoyed meeting their high school friends after a long time .
output.sentences: In the summer time it is popular to have a party.
Summer parties are usually on the weekend or after school.
The female guests arrived at the house.
It was a fun time meeting everyone and talking about school.
